name: Dead Reckoning: Snowbird's Creek - Hidden Objects
name_original: Dead Reckoning: Snowbird's Creek - Hidden Objects
description:
Play the trial for FREE! Pay once & complete the adventure!

Ever since the gold rush, the small town of Snowbird’s Creek has been a prosperous mining location. But now, a new railroad project has the citizens quite literally divided. This project could be the difference between life and death for this community, but there are those who want to see it fail. The railroad tycoon leading this project has been found murdered, and there seem to be a lot of suspects!

• THIS IS A MURDER WITH A GOLDEN MOTIVE!
Who has the most to gain by sabotaging this project? It seems that quite a few people were unhappy about it, but enough to commit murder?

• WHO REALLY KILLED SETH SAVAGE?
Search through all the suspects in a town full of intriguing hidden object scenes.

• COLLECT ALL OF THE CLUES ON YOUR EVIDENCE BOARD
Use all the tools of your trade to solve intricate puzzles and curious mini-games.

• INVESTIGATE ANOTHER CASE IN THE SHOCKING BONUS CHAPTER
Discover a new revelation and enjoy additional Collector’s Edition exclusives including collectible Fish Signs, morphing objects, and more!
